entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 p.m. MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h except 70 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 near the Richardson mountains in the morning and early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
